A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: What was this movie? There's no logic. There's no gravity in space! Everyone was basically made into a fool than character buildup. Fight me Rian\, but this was not a Star Wars movie. More or less\, it's kind of like a Spaceballs movie gone political. The only good thing about this movie was that it was beautifully shot.
